The purpose of the final paper is to learn about a moral psychology research topic that interests you but that we did not fully explore in class. 

1.  Choose a research topic from the following choices. I've added a suggested initial reading to get you started. If you have your own idea for a research topic, send me an e-mail, and I can help you refine it and choose some initial readings. 


    * Morality and psychopathy
    
    * Moral forecasting
    
    * Tainted altruism
    
    * Vegetarianism/ moralizing animals
    
    * The morality of political libertarians
    
    * Creativity and dishonesty
  
    * Moral licensing
